LanguageData.ARA_CreepFungus.label: creepfungus
LanguageData.ARA_CreepFungus.description: This mushroom is harvested from the creep plant. It can be eaten raw, but it tastes better when cooked.
LanguageData.ARA_CreepPlant.label: creep plant
LanguageData.ARA_CreepPlant.description: A strange plant that grows only on Arachne creep.It must grow in the dark, consumes very little fertility, and produces mushrooms that the insect swarms can eat.
LanguageData.ARA_BeeSpikePlant.label: bee spike plant
LanguageData.ARA_BeeSpikePlant.description: It is a fungal mixture cultivated by Arachne insects. It absorbs nutrients from creep, and when it reaches a certain growth stage, it undergoes metamorphosis and eventually transforms into a bee-stinging archer - a sentient mushroom-shaped unit that shoots poisonous stingers at enemy troops.
LanguageData.ARA_BanelingTrapPlant.label: explosion plant
LanguageData.ARA_BanelingTrapPlant.description: It is a mixture of fungi cultivated by a group of Arachne insects. It absorbs the nutrients of the creep, and when it reaches a certain growth stage, it undergoes metamorphosis and finally transforms into an Arachne exploding cocoon - a special trap that releases self-destructing auxiliary insects at nearby enemy forces.
LanguageData.ARA_Bacterium_Plant.label: bacterium plant
LanguageData.ARA_Bacterium_Plant.description: It is a strange plant that only grows on Arachne creep.It needs to grow in the dark, but it consumes very little fertility and produces an active bacterium plant, which is necessary for the insect population.
